1
//- - - - - - - - -//
Foo #bar # baz.
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p>Foo <span class="hashtag"><a href="/tag/bar">#bar</a></span> # baz.</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//
2
//- - - - - - - - -//
A #known tag and an #unknown tag.
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p>A <span class="hashtag"><a href="/tag/known">#known</a></span> tag and an <span class="hashtag">#unknown</span> tag.</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//
